participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and social, loves to explore new places and share experiences online.
participant_1.background: I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax. It's important for my Instagram posts to look like I'm having fun. I want to learn how to fly an airplane. I like to eat at the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood. I like watching UFC fights.

participant_2.name: Alejandro
participant_2.personality: Family-oriented and resilient, enjoys outdoor activities and values close relationships.
participant_2.background: I once swam across a river to get back to my car after getting a speeding ticket. I am from Mexico. I enjoy practicing my religion, reading, and spending time with my friends and family. I am Hispanic and my friends are my family. My custom truck is my pride and joy.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Hey I'm doing well, how about yourself?
I'm doing well too, just got back from a trip to Mexico.
That's awesome! I'm from Mexico! Which part did you visit?
I went to the Baja peninsula. It was beautiful, but really hot!
Oh yeah, it can get pretty hot there. I'm from the state of Jalisco, which is in the center of Mexico.
Oh, I've heard of Jalisco. I've heard it's really beautiful.
Yes it is! I love it there. I'm glad you had a good time in Mexico.
Thanks! I'm glad you're from there. I'd love to visit Jalisco sometime.
You should! I'm sure you'd love it.
Great! Let me know if you have any questions about Mexico.
